meanings.definition: The bone in front of the pubis in some vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The prepubis provides support for the lower body.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian examined the prepubis of the turtle.
meanings.sent3: The prepubis bone decided to take a break from all the jumping.
meanings.sent4: The prepubis bone stood strong like a pillar in the body's structure.
meanings.sent5: The prepubis bone, like a loyal guard, protected the vital organs.

meanings.definition: The anterior part of the pelvis in some mammals.
meanings.sent1: The prepubis of the dog was injured during the fall.
meanings.sent2: The prepubis plays a crucial role in the mammal's movement.
meanings.sent3: The prepubis area of the cat seemed to be ticklish.
meanings.sent4: The prepubis region was the heart of the mammal's stability.
meanings.sent5: The prepubis, like a bridge, connected the legs to the rest of the body.
